ranking.themetenpts: Number of theme at more than 10 points
ranking.themetwentypts: Number of theme at more than 20 points

rules.step2: Select a game mode (solo, duel, duel against friends, training)
rules.step3: Answer questions in the time given!

mode1.title: Solo
mode1.goal: The goal is to make the biggest series of a good response on the theme of Selected.
mode1.explain: The questions are linked to you to answer in the allotted time, only one bad answer and it is the end of the game.

mode2.title: Duel
mode2.goal: The goal is to make more points than your opponent.
mode2.explain: You will have 5 questions with a time given to answer them.

mode3.title: Duel against friends
mode3.goal: The goal is to make more points than your friend.
mode3.explain: You will have 5 questions with a time given to answer them.

mode4.title: Training
mode4.explain: You chain the questions without time limit no matter if you answer badly or.

warning.warning1: You can play without connecting, but your scores will not be saved.

question1.title: How do I install the application?
question1.explain: To install the application on phone, tablet or PC click on this <anchor>{{link}}</anchor>

question3.title: How do I add a friend?
question3.explain: Go to the players page (<anchor>{{link}}</anchor>), then click on the avatar of the player you want to add.

question4.title: How to delete a friend?
question4.explain: Go to the players page (<anchor>{{link}}</anchor>), then click on the avatar of the player you want to add.

question5.title: How do I add a theme?

question6.title: How do I add a question?

question7.title: How do I report a problem?
question7.explain: At the end of a game you can report a question via the signal button. <anchor>{{link}}</anchor>))

installation.apple1: At the address bar, press Share.
installation.apple2: Search the Add on the home screen option, then press it.

rules1.title: Article 1 - Account in application
rules1.text: The user creating an account on the application has the possibility of accessing it by logging in thanks to the identifiers provided when registering. The user is fully responsible for the protection of the password he chose.

rules2.title: Article 2 - Exemption from the publisher's responsibility as part of the execution of this contract
rules2.text: In the event of impossibility of accessing the application, due to technical problems or all kinds, the user cannot claim damage and cannot claim any compensation.

rules3.title: Article 3 - Access to application by Internet connection
rules3.text: The responsibility of the publisher cannot be engaged due to a technical unavailability of connection, whether due in particular to a case of force majeure, maintenance, update, modification, intervention by the host, an internal or external strike, an electrical breakdown of the network, an electrical power outage, or even a bad configuration or use of the user's device.

rules4.title: Article 4 - Account closure
rules4.text: Each user is free to close their account on the application.

rules5.title: Article 5 - Applicable law and mediation
rules5.text: These general conditions are subject to the application of French law.

rules1.title: Introduction and role of the Charter
rules1.text: This charter aims to inform you of the commitments of the application with respect for your privacy and the protection of personal data concerning you, collected and processed during your use of the application.

rules2.title: Personal data
rules2.text: Quizbattle collects your email address and password if you create an account in order to authenticate you but it remains confidential and is not displayed for other users.

rules3.title: Saved data
rules3.text: Quizbattle saves all the results of your solo and duel parts in order to display your statistics on your profile and calculate your classification.

rules4.title: Purchases
rules4.text: Quizbattle is 100% free and does not use any online purchase.

rules5.title: Contact
rules5.text: For all complaints, questions or ideas, you can use the following email address: PierreMichel804@gmail.com

sort.gamessolo: Sort by number of solo parts
sort.gamesduel: Sort by number of duel parts
sort.scoresolo: Sort by best score partly solo
sort.scoreduel: Sort by best classification partly duel

tutorial.title: Welcome to Quizbattle
tutorial.explain: Quizbattle is a game of quiz allowing you to test your knowledge of a multitude of themes thanks to 3 fun and free game modes.

share.title: Quizbattle
share.score: Join Quizbattle and come and beat my score {{score}} on the theme {{theme}}.
share.text: Join Quizbattle and come and challenge me on a multitude of themes.
